revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "(Column) 52:;Didymion, son of Petheus the older, grandson of Didymion, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 4;;Heron, son of Petheus, grandson of Kollouthos, mother Taorsenouphis, drachmas 4;;Thermouthis, daughter of Panther (Germanus, son of Mersis);;orchard taxes for the 12th year, apomoira drachmas 3 obols 4.5, tax on the produce of olives obols 3 chalki 2, naubion obols 2 chalki 2, surcharges obols 5.5 chalki 2;;(in left margin: drachmas 16 obols 25)eparourion drachmas 2 obols 3, surcharges obol 1 chalki 2, kollybos obol 1, in total drachmas 8 obols 3;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 9 obols 2 chalki 2, surcharges obls 3.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 10;;Ptolemaios, son of Papeis, grandson of Petheus, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 8;;Petheus, son of Petaus, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Segathis, drachmas 8;;Sisois, son of Limnaios, grandson of Satabous, mother Thaesis, drachmas 8;;in total for the day drachmas 128 obols 25;;(Pharmouthi) 12 likewise:;Chairemon, son of Areios, grandson of Satabous, mother Tapetaus, drachmas 24;;Areios, son of Sokrates, grandson of Limnaios, mother Tapetaus, drachmas 24;;Mystharion, son of Petheus, grandson of Esouris, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Gaius Valerius Serenus, cultivator of the 55th clerouchy;;(Sarap(), brother, Plakakert());;orchard taxes in the 12th year for the district of Psenarpsenesis, apomoira drachmas 7 obols 3, tax on the produce of olives drachma 1 obols 4.5, naubion obols 4.5, surcharges drachmas 2;;eparourion drachmas 5, surcharges obols 2.5, kollybos obols 2, in total drachmas 17 obols 4.5;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 11, surcharges obols 4 chalki 2, in total drachmas 11 obols 4 chalki 2;;Heraklas, son of Apollonios, grandson of Heraklas, mother Taorsenouphis, drachmas 8;;Ptolemaios, son of Naaraus the older, grandson of Thebennis, mother Tamarres, drachmas 4;;Petaus, son of Esouris, grandson of Petheus, mother Tkollauthis, drachmas 4 obols 28;;in total for the day drachmas 100 obols 16;;(Pharmouthi) 13 likewise:;Horion, son of Maron, grandson of Horion, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 28;;Imouthes, son of Keras, grandson of Menadros, mother Tepheros, drachmas 8;;Petheus, son of Didymos, grandson of Maron, mother Tauris, drachmas 4;;Pnepheros, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4;;Sarapion, son of Valerius, grandson of Sarapion, mother Stotoetis, drachmas 8;;Sokmenis, son of Apynchis, grandson of Sambas, mother Thatres, drachmas 12;;Ptolemaios, son of Orsenouphis, grandson of Herieus, mother Anthia, drachmas 4;;Gaius Saturnilus Longus (Slo);;orchard taxes for the 12th year, apomoira drachmas 3 obols 4.5, tax on the produce of olives obols 3 chalki 2, naubion obols 2.5, surcharges drachma 1;;(in left margin: drachmas 20 obols 2) eparourion drachmas 2 obols 3, surcharges obol 1.5, kollybos obol 1, in total drachmas 8 obols 3.5 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 9 obols 2 chalki 2, surcharges obol 0.5, kollybos chalki 2, in total drachmas 10;;naubion of katoikoi for the 13th year, obols 2.5, surcharges 0.5, kollybos obols 3 chalki 2;;Maron, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Sambathion, mother Taseus, drachmas 20."

listBibl.bibl: Rep Editor - Pearl OM; Rep Ser. - Diss; 1938; pg. 9 - 10 Youtie HC, PMich IV, 1, 224, 1937 -- CPJ 3, 492 (lines with Sambathion) Pearl OM - Youtie HC, PMich IV, 357 C, D, 1939
